Constructor Summary
ArrayMethods()
           
 
Method Summary
 double average()
          returns the average of array elements
 int[] copyArray()
          returns a copy of array a
 int count()
          returns a count of array elements
 int[] findAll(int key)
          returns an array of the indices of each instance of key in the original array
 int findIndexOfMax()
          returns the index of the first instance of the maximum value in the array
 int findLast(int key)
          returns the index of the last instance of key
 int findMax()
          returns the highest value in the array
 int findMin()
          returns the lowest value in the array
 void genFiveByFiveCols()
          generates a 5x5 char array, fills it with values (each row contains the values {'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E'}), and prints the array.
 void genFiveByFiveRows()
          generates a 5x5 integer array, fills it with values (each row contains the values {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}), and prints the array.
 int[] getArray()
          getter for array int[] a
 void print(int[] a)
          prints each element of the array
 int range()
          returns the range of values in the array
 int[] reverse(int[] inArray)
          reverses the order of array elements
 int[] sortArray(int[] inArray)
          sorts elements of array from lowest to highest
 int sum()
          returns a sum of all array elements
